flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
I love the Solder: Time watch kit, but to see the time I must push the display button. Not any more!

I connected a tiny tilt switch to display to time with a turn of my wrist.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I love the Solder: Time watch kit, but to see the time I must push the display button. Not any more!

I connected a tiny tilt switch to display to time with a turn of my wrist.
guide.summary: Built the Solder: Time wristwatch last week and decided to hack/mod it with a tiny tilt switch. Now if I turn my wrist to read the watch, it comes on with out me pushing the display button.
guide.title: Solder: Time tilt switch mod.
